headline: AMD Achieves First TSMC N2 Product Silicon Milestone
summary: AMD Achieves First TSMC N2 Product Silicon Milestone "AMD Chair and CEO, Dr. Lisa Su and TSMC Chairman and CEO Dr. C.C. Wei holding a wafer of the next gen AMD EPYC CPU, codenamed 'Venice' produced on the TSMC advanced 2nm (N2) process technology." — Next-generation AMD EPYC CPU, codenamed “Venice,” is the first HPC product to be brought up on TSMC’s next-generation N2 node — SANTA CLARA, Calif., April 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AMD (NASDAQ: AMD) today announced its next-generation AMD EPYC™ p
